title: Mercedes-Benz E-Class (2018): The Exterior Design | Presented by Dave Erickson

json.text: As we all know the E-Class has been the pinnacle of driving comfort in its class for decades.
In this generation the E-Class has been extensively enhanced.
Letâ€™s take a closer look at the details of the E-Class with the exterior.
Overall this car feels even cooler, younger and fresher than ever before.
As you look around you can see everything seems to fit together perfectly.
Clearly the designers put a lot of time and emotion into the detail of the exterior.
For me driving the E-Class in a word:
